verses.text: \w Praise|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H3027"\w*, \w teaching|strong="H3925"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* use \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w fingers|strong="H0676"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* art \w of|strong="H3068"\w* fighting:

He \w is|strong="H4043"\w* \w my|strong="H8478"\w* strength, \w and|strong="H4043"\w* \w my|strong="H8478"\w* Rock; \w my|strong="H8478"\w* high tower, \w and|strong="H4043"\w* \w my|strong="H8478"\w* saviour; \w my|strong="H8478"\w* keeper \w and|strong="H4043"\w* \w my|strong="H8478"\w* hope: he gives \w me|strong="H8478"\w* authority over \w my|strong="H8478"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* keep \w him|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w mind|strong="H3045"\w*? \w or|strong="H0120"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w take|strong="H3045"\w* \w him|strong="H3045"\w* into account?

\w Man|strong="H0120"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w like|strong="H1819"\w* \w a|strong="H1819"\w* \w breath|strong="H1892"\w*: \w his|strong="H3117"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w like|strong="H1819"\w* \w a|strong="H1819"\w* \w shade|strong="H6738"\w* which \w is|strong="H3117"\w* quickly gone.

\w Come|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*: \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w let|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w give|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w smoke|strong="H6225"\w*.

\w With|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* storm-flames \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H7971"\w* flight: \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* destruction.

\w Put|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w high|strong="H4791"\w*; \w make|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w free|strong="H7971"\w*, \w take|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* safely \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*;

\w In|strong="H1696"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w words|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w deceit|strong="H8267"\w*.

\w I|strong="H7891"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* make \w a|strong="H0430"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H2167"\w*, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \w I|strong="H7891"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* make melody \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H2167"\w* \w on|strong="H0430"\w* \w an|strong="H0430"\w* \w instrument|strong="H5035"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w ten|strong="H6218"\w* cords.

\w It|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w who|strong="H5650"\w* \w gives|strong="H5414"\w* \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*; \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w who|strong="H5650"\w* \w kept|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w from|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wounding \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

\w Make|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w* free, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w* \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w words|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w deceit|strong="H8267"\w*.

\w Our|strong="H0834"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* \w tall|strong="H1431"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w plants|strong="H5195"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H0834"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* shining stones \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* king's house;

\w Our|strong="H0413"\w* store-houses \w are|strong="H4392"\w* \w full|strong="H4392"\w* \w of|strong="H4392"\w* all good things; \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w our|strong="H0413"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w give|strong="H6329"\w* birth \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thousands \w and|strong="H6629"\w* ten thousands \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w our|strong="H0413"\w* \w fields|strong="H2351"\w*.

\w Our|strong="H3318"\w* oxen \w are|strong="H0369"\w* well weighted down; \w our|strong="H3318"\w* cows give birth safely; \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w cry|strong="H6682"\w* \w of|strong="H0369"\w* sorrow \w in|strong="H3318"\w* \w our|strong="H3318"\w* \w open|strong="H7339"\w* places.

\w Happy|strong="H0835"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w nation|strong="H5971"\w* whose ways \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H3602"\w* ordered: yes, \w happy|strong="H0835"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w nation|strong="H5971"\w* whose \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
